entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:14 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -38.4°C
Wind: NW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
